markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Koto Zekora](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1471)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 46

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 46

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Koto Zekora](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1471)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=79" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Oni" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=303" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 55</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +26, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +30, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +3

**Con** +6

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +9
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [half-plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +25 

+1 status on all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 295

, regeneration 15 (deactivated by acid or fire)

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatclub_ +31 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 3d10+20 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+16 bludgeoning

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 36
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261) (3 slots)
- **8th**
[Maze](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224), [Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267) (3 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 36, 3 Focus Points
- **8th**
[Ancestral Memories](/Spells.aspx?ID=493), [Arcane Countermeasure](/Spells.aspx?ID=496), [Extend Spell](/Spells.aspx?ID=507)

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 36
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47)

**Bloodline Magic**   When Koto Zekora casts a bloodline spell, [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), or [_maze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), she gains a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Koto Zekora takes on the appearance of an [ogre](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=78). This doesn't change her Speed or Strike attack and damage.

</column>
name: Koto Zekora

darkvision Languages Abyssal, Infernal, Jotun, Tien Skills Acrobatics +26, Arcana +27, Athletics +33, Deception +34, Intimidation +34, Nature +26, Occultism +30, Society +27 Str +8 Dex +3 Con +6 Int +4 Wis +2 Cha +9 Items +2 greater striking greatclub , +2 resilient half-plate --- AC 39 Fort +31 Ref +26 Will +25 +1 status on all saves vs. magic HP 295 , regeneration 15 (deactivated by acid or fire) Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 30 feet, fly 30 feet Melee Single Action greatclub +31 (Backswing, Magical, reach 10 feet, Shove), Damage 3d10+20 bludgeoning Melee Single Action fist +29 (Agile, Evil, Magical, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8+16 bludgeoning Arcane Spontaneous Spells DC 36 - Cantrips (8th) Acid Splash, Daze, Detect Magic, Electric Arc, Ray of Frost, Shield - 1st Feather Fall, Grease, Magic Missile, True Strike (3 slots) - 2nd Acid Arrow, Dispel Magic, See Invisibility, Spider Climb (3 slots) - 3rd Fear, Fireball, Haste, Slow (3 slots) - 4th Dimension Door, Freedom of Movement, Invisibility, Wall of Fire (3 slots) - 5th Cone of Cold, Fireball, Prying Eye, Wall of Stone (3 slots) - 6th Chain Lightning, Disintegrate, Lightning Bolt, Vampiric Exsanguination (3 slots) - 7th Eclipse Burst, Mask of Terror, Prismatic Spray, Reverse Gravity (3 slots) - 8th Maze, Polar Ray, Scintillating Pattern (3 slots) Sorcerer Bloodline Spells DC 36, 3 Focus Points - 8th Ancestral Memories, Arcane Countermeasure, Extend Spell Primal Innate Spells DC 36 - 2nd Darkness, Invisibility (at will; self only) - 3rd Fear - 4th Charm, Gaseous Form, Sleep - 5th Cone of Cold Bloodline Magic When Koto Zekora casts a bloodline spell, dimension door , disintegrate , dispel magic , haste , magic missile , prismatic spray , prying eye , or maze , she gains a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round. Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Transmutation) Koto Zekora takes on the appearance of an ogre. This doesn't change her Speed or Strike attack and damage.
